title: $:/plugins/yaisog/single-tiddler-view
author: yaisog
name: single-tiddler-view
readme:
<$button class="tc-btn-invisible" style="overflow: hidden;white-space: pre;width: 100%;" message="tm-open-external-window" param="https://yaisog.tiddlyhost.com/">{{$:/core/images/home-button}} <$text text="https://yaisog.tiddlyhost.com/"/></$button>

* show only a single tiddler at a time in the story
* no animations when navigating to tiddlers
* use the `Open` tab of the sidebar to navigate between open tiddlers
